name: PROMISSleepWakeAssessment
title: PROMIS Sleep Wake Assessment
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Assessment or evaluation of the disturbance of night-sleep cycles and it's interference with daytime alertness),(Data Element Scope: Maps to the Assessment category of the QDM.),(Inclusion Criteria: Night sleeping behaviors, daytime sleepiness, napping, drowsiness, sleep deprivation interference with ADL),(Exclusion Criteria: Fatigue, exercise, depression)
